name: Peter Benjamin Parker
biography: Bitten by a radioactive spider, Peter Parker's arachnid abilities grant him incredible powers, which he uses to help others while his personal life continues to pose many obstacles.

name: Carol Danvers
biography: Carol Danvers becomes one of the most powerful heroines in the universe when Earth is caught in the middle of a galactic war between two alien races.

name: Robert Bruce Banner
biography: Dr. Bruce Banner lives a life caught between the soft-spoken scientist he has always been and the uncontrollable green monster driven by his anger.

name: Natalia (Natasha) Alianovna Romanova
biography: Natasha Romanoff, separated from the now fractured Avengers, confronts the dark path she took to become a spy and assassin, as well as the events that followed.

name: Matthew Michael Murdock
biography: Blinded in a childhood accident, lawyer Matt Murdock protects Hell's Kitchen as the masked vigilante, Daredevil.

name: James Howlett
biography: A mutant with unstoppable healing power, adamantium metal claws, and a no-nonsense attitude makes the man known as Logan one of the fiercest heroes in the universe.

name: Steven Rogers
biography: Recipient of the Super Soldier serum, World War II hero Steve Rogers fights for American ideals as one of the most powerful heroes in the world and the leader of the Avengers.

name: Anthony Edward 'Tony' Stark
biography: Genius. Billionaire. Philanthropist. Tony Stark's confidence is only matched by his high-flying abilities as the hero called Iron Man.

name: Thor Odinson
biography: Odin's son uses his mighty powers as the God of Thunder to protect his home Asgard and the planet Earth alike.

name: Unrevealed
biography: Apparently, she learned to use her shape-shifting power at a very young age, as there is no known evidence to the public or the government that Raven Darkholme ever looked like anything other than a normal human being.

name: Felicia Hardy
biography: Black Cat follows in her father's footsteps by learning the tricks of the trade for thievery, ultimately giving up her criminal ways to fight for the common good.

name: Avengers
biography: Earth's mightiest heroes stand as the first line of defense for the planet against the most powerful threats in the universe.

name: Guardians of the Galaxy
biography: Think of them as good guys... with an unconventional approach to the superhero business.

name: Defenders
biography: Though its membership has evolved over the years, The Defenders always pursue the same goal: protecting the innocent from any threat.

name: X-Men
biography: Charles Xavier's team of merry mutants is charged with the mission to protect a world that hates and fears them for their unusual appearances and abilities.

name: Fantastic Four
biography: Mister Fantastic, Invisible Woman, Human Torch, and the Thing use their scientific backgrounds to unite and defend the world against dangerous threats.

name: Inhumans
biography: Created as an experiment by the alien Kree race, the Inhumans are a strain of humanity with extraordinary abilities.
